survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Cafeteria Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the quality, variety, and accessibility of workplace cafeteria services to improve offerings and satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the workplace cafeteria services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure frequency accurately.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use the workplace cafeteria services?

questions.question_text: What factors influence your decision to use the cafeteria? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice to allow respondents to select multiple influencing factors.

script.question_text: What factors influence your decision to use the cafeteria? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current variety of food options available in the cafeteria?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current variety of food options available in the cafeteria?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the workplace cafeteria services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the workplace cafeteria services?

questions.question_text: If you rarely or never use the cafeteria, please briefly explain why.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to understand barriers to cafeteria usage.

script.question_text: If you rarely or never use the cafeteria, please briefly explain why.
